pages.text: Matches items or fluids from a specific mod. Type a mod ID directly, or paste an item ID and the mod namespace gets extracted automatically. You can add multiple mod IDs to one filter.$(br2)Set it to whitelist or blacklist, and pick items or fluids as the target type.

pages.title: On Export vs Import
pages.text: $(l)On an export channel:$() Only pulls out items/fluids from the listed mods.$(br2)$(l)On an import channel:$() Only accepts items/fluids from the listed mods.$(br2)Both sides are checked. Handy for sorting all items from one mod into a dedicated storage area.
